thread.title: Watch The Official Trailer for Edgar Wright’s ‘Baby Driver’
thread.title_full: Watch The Official Trailer for Edgar Wright’s ‘Baby Driver’

author: Jesse Bernard
title: Watch The Official Trailer for Edgar Wright’s ‘Baby Driver’
text:
British director Edgar Wright’s latest film is promised to be his most music-driven picture yet. Starring Jamie Foxx, Jon Hamm, Jon Bernthal, Lily James, Ansel Elgort and Kevin Spacey, the movie will be premiered at this year’s SXSW.
Baby Driver follows a young getaway driver named Baby (Ansel Elgort) who is nearly mute and suffers from a condition that leaves a constant ringing in his ears, so he must reply on his own personal soundtrack in order to be the best in the game.
Although the movie premieres at SXSW, Baby Driver isn’t expected to hit theaters until August 11 but you can watch the first trailer above now.
In other movies, meet Michael Fassbender’s Walter , the new android in Ridley Scott’s Alien: Covenant.
